a-transfer/dataSource.description: Used for setting the source data. The elements that are part of this array will be present the left column. Except the elements whose keys are included in targetKeys prop.

a-transfer/filterOption.description: A function to determine whether an item should show in search result list

a-transfer/footer.description: customize the progress dot by setting a scoped slot

a-transfer/lazy.description: property of vc-lazy-load for lazy rendering items. Turn off it by set to false.

a-transfer/listStyle.description: A custom CSS style used for rendering the transfer columns.

a-transfer/locale.description: i18n text including filter, empty text, item unit, etc
a-transfer/locale.defaultValue: { itemUnit: 'item', itemsUnit: 'items', notFoundContent: 'The list is empty', searchPlaceholder: 'Search here' }

a-transfer/operations.description: A set of operations that are sorted from top to bottom.

a-transfer/render.description: The function to generate the item shown on a column. Based on an record (element of the dataSource array), this function should return a element which is generated from that record. Also, it can return a plain object with value and label, label is a element and value is for title

a-transfer/selectedKeys.description: A set of keys of selected items.

a-transfer/showSearch.description: If included, a search box is shown on each column.

a-transfer/targetKeys.description: A set of keys of elements that are listed on the right column.

a-transfer/titles.description: A set of titles that are sorted from left to right.
